title: SOLD - Babe Ruth 1929 Imperial / Churchman's Tobacco -
author: Cozumeleno

posts.post_title: SOLD - Babe Ruth 1929 Imperial / Churchman's Tobacco -
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a Babe Ruth 1929 Imperial / Churchman's Tobacco card. This is a UK issue and harder to find in the U.S.

Clean front and mostly clean back with only some light creasing. 

SOLD via PPFF delivered (add 3% for regular PP).

Looks like I'm the person who won this on ebay. Cheers, been wanting this one for quite some time. 

Sent from my SAMSUNG-SM-N910A using Tapatalk
Thanks for your purchase and glad to see you're a member here. Card will be on the way to you shortly!

Arrived today. Thanks

Sent from my SAMSUNG-SM-N910A using Tapatalk
